text.148_Daf, 17_Line, 1_Comment: Cooking spices: A spice for a pleasant fragrant cooked dish.
text.148_Daf, 17_Line, 0_Comment: Women's adornments: Spices that they crush in a mortar with which they adorn themselves, that their smell should be pleasant to their husbands.
text.138_Daf, 2_Line, 0_Comment: On account of the congregation’s honor - For they would have to wait in passive silence [while the Torah was rolled].
text.148_Daf, 18_Line, 0_Comment: There fell for them precious stones: They brought a voluntary offering from that which they found every morning, when they go out to pick up the manna, as it is stated, "and they picked it up each morning."
text.148_Daf, 19_Line, 0_Comment: “Just like this shad (breast), a baby tastes several tastes: that the mother eats.
